Account settings SETTINGS Security Log out from all devices. Application Enable language adaptation Notifications Notify me by email Remove account Delete my account DELETE SUBMIT CHANGES
Welcome to Bugy! 
 
This app is designed for entomologists and all insect lovers. Here you can learn much about bugs around you. 
Bugy allows you to edit all the information from the base it is connected to, so please take that tool seriously and do not add any ill-suited text. 
All species are from this page: https://bugguide.net/node/view/15740 
 
With this app you can: 
 • Search the base with about 11 230 species 
 • Read information about insects 
 • Add an insect to your personal collection 
 • Edit all the information and add your notes 
 • Add photos, view gallery 
 • Add an insect that doesn't yet exist! 
 • View your collection 
 • Customize your app settings 
 
Bugy v1.0 
Developed by L.C. 
© 2020
HELP Need help? 
Here are some useful tips: 
 • When you log in, choose activity you want. 
 • In settings you can change app settings. 
 • Click three dots in the top right corner to get more options. 
 • When you add insect to collection, you can add notes. 
 • Delete insect from collection as you added it. 
 
For any more information or complications that can occur while using app, please let us know by email: bugy.suport@gmail.com
